sn35.7:1.3: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako atitasmim cakkhusmim anapekkho hoti;
sn35.7:1.5: paccuppannassa cakkhussa nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
sn35.7:1.10: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako atitaya jivhaya anapekkho hoti;
sn35.7:1.12: paccuppannaya jivhaya nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
sn35.7:1.16: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako atitasmim manasmim anapekkho hoti;
sn35.7:1.18: paccuppannassa manassa nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti”ti.
